description: Final verification that OpenClaw instance is fully operational
steps: 3. Gateway status: `ssh openclaw@{ip} 'openclaw gateway status'` should show running
4. Systemd service: `ssh openclaw@{ip} 'systemctl --user is-active openclaw-gateway'` should say active
5. Tailscale: `ssh openclaw@{ip} 'tailscale status'` should show connected
6. Telegram: `ssh openclaw@{ip} 'openclaw channels status'` should show telegram enabled
8. UFW firewall: `ssh root@{ip} 'ufw status'` should show active
9. Disk space: `ssh openclaw@{ip} 'df -h /'` should have >50% free
10. Memory: `ssh openclaw@{ip} 'free -h'` should have reasonable free memory
Count passed checks, report any failures
If all pass: update metadata.json status=operational, verified_at=timestamp
If failures: update metadata.json status=degraded, list failures
Generate quickref card: write instances/{name}/QUICKREF.md with access details
